Question 7

```{r}
theta = rnorm(100000, mean = 0, sd = sqrt(32))
y = rnorm(100000, mean = theta/4, sd = sqrt(32))

theta = theta[y > 1.99 & y < 2.01]
y = y[y > 1.99 & y < 2.01]
plot(y, theta)
hist(theta)
hist(y)
print(mean(theta))
```
